duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct pre-trip and post-trip vehicle inspections
Deliver and/or pick up freight to/from customer locations and/or a terminal as instructed by dispatch or the immediate supervisor
Ensure all shipping documentation is available for DOT inspection and appropriate paperwork accompanies the shipment to the delivery point
Load and/or unload a wide variety of freight onto and off a company motor vehicle, at customer locations and at the terminal, with or without mechanical assistance depending on the size of freight
